#summary Installation instructions

== Download sources ==

{{{
svn checkout https://dftfem.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ dftfem --username ondrej.certik
}}}

== Install contrib libraries ==

{{{
cd contrib
./make
}}}

This will install arpack, petsc, slepc and libmesh.

== Install dftfem ==

{{{
cd src
make
}}}
